newsArray.title: இலங்கை, பாகிஸ்தான் இடையிலான 2வது டி20 போட்டி மழையால் ரத்து
newsArray.description: முதல் போட்டியில் வென்ற பாகிஸ்தான் டி20 தொடரில் 1-0 என முன்னிலை வகிக்கிறது.3வது மற்றும் கடைசி டி20 போட்டி நாளை மறுதினம் நடைபெற உள்ளது.
creator: மாலை மலர்

newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: England Coach: ಮೆಕಲಮ್ ಸ್ಥಾನಕ್ಕೆ ಐಪಿಎಲ್ ವಿನ್ನಿಂಗ್ ಕೋಚ್ ನೇಮಕ ಮಾಡಿ, ಇಂಗ್ಲೆಂಡ್ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟ್​ ಉಳಿಸಿ! ಇಸಿಬಿಗೆ ಪೀಟರ್ಸನ್ ಮನವಿ
newsArray.description: ಆ್ಯಷಸ್ ಸರಣಿ (Ashes Series) ಸೋಲು ಕಾಣುತ್ತಿದ್ದಂತೆ ಆ ಟೀಕೆಗಳು ಹೆಚ್ಚಾಗುತ್ತಿವೆ. ಇದೀಗ ಮಾಜಿ ಇಂಗ್ಲೆಂಡ್ ನಾಯಕ ಕೆವಿನ್ ಪೀಟರ್​ಸನರ್ (Kevin Pietersen)​ ಮೆಕಲಮ್ ಕೋಚ್ ವೈಖರಿಯನ್ನ ಟೀಕಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ.
creator: rajesha m b
newsArray.sentiment: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.sentiment_stats: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: WPL And Misogynistic Songs: BCCI Roasted For Roping In Yo Yo Honey Singh For Women's Premier League 2026 Opening Ceremony
newsArray.description: Netizens pointed out that a cricket league that caters to women shouldn't have roped in a singer who is infamous for promoting misogyny in his songs.
creator: editor@republicworld.com (devasheesh pandey)

newsArray.title: Noakhali end six-match losing streak with win over Rangpur
newsArray.description: Newcomers Noakhali Express finally opened their account in the ongoing Bangladesh Premier League (BPL) T20, snapping a six-match losing streak with a dramatic nine-run victory over Rangpur Riders at the Sylhet International Cricket Stadium on Friday.
creator: sports reporter from sylhet

newsArray.title: Who Is Adithya Ashok? The New Zealand Player Born In Vellore Set To Face India, With A Rajinikanth Dialogue Tattoo
newsArray.description: Adithya Ashok is set to play for New Zealand during the ODI series against India after a gap of over two years. The 23-year-old was born in the Indian city of Vellore. He has a connection with the Chennai Super Kings and also has a Rajinikanth-inspired tattoo inked on his arm.
creator: aayush kataria
newsArray.sentiment: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: BCCI ने वीवीएस लक्ष्मण से की खास मीटिंग, बैठक के बाद क्या बोले सचिव देवजीत सैकिया?
newsArray.description: बीसीसीआई के अधिकारियों ने सेंटर ऑफ एक्सीलेंस के प्रमुख वीवीएस लक्ष्मण के साथ मुंबई में बैठक की। इसमें कई मुद्दों पर चर्चा हुई। सेंटर ऑफ एक्सीलेंस में अभी कई पद खाली हैं और अब BCCI का ध्यान उन्हें भरने पर है।
creator: govind singh
newsArray.sentiment: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.sentiment_stats: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: BCB official calls former Bangladesh captain Tamim Iqbal 'Indian agent' amid Mustafizur Rahman row; triggers protest from players
newsArray.description: A Bangladesh Cricket Board official's accusation of former captain Tamim Iqbal being an "Indian agent" has sparked outrage among players and the Cricketers’ Welfare Association. Tamim had previously advised the board against emotional decisions regarding the T20 World Cup. Players are demanding an apology and accountability from the official.
creator: toi sports desk
